org.jclouds.abiquo.features

Interface CloudApi


  • public interface CloudApi
    Provides synchronous access to Abiquo Cloud API.
    Author:
    Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
    See Also:
    http://community.abiquo.com/display/ABI20/API+Reference, CloudAsyncApi

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The task reference or null if the operation completed synchronously.

      • replaceVolumes

                                                                   VirtualMachineOptions options,
                                                                   com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto... volumes)

        If the virtual machine is deployed, the operation will be executed asynchronously.

        Parameters:
        virtualMachine - The virtual machine.
        options - virtual machine parameters
        volumes - The new volumes for the virtual machine.
        Returns:
        The task reference or null if the operation completed synchronously.

        com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto createVolume(com.abiquo.server.core.cloud.VirtualDatacenterDto virtualDatacenter,
                                                                             com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto volume)
        Creates a volume in the given virtual datacenter.
        Parameters:
        virtualDatacenter - The virtual datacenter where the volume will be created.
        volume - The volume to create. This volume dto must contain a link to the tier where the volume should be created.
        Returns:

      • updateVolume

        com.abiquo.model.transport.AcceptedRequestDto<String> updateVolume(com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto volume)
        Modifies the given volume.

        If the virtual machine is deployed and the size of the volume is changed, then an asynchronous task will be generated to refresh the resources of the virtual machine in the hypervisor.

        Parameters:
        volume - The volume to modify.
        Returns:
        The task reference or null if no task was generated.

      • deleteVolume

        void deleteVolume(com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto volume)
        Delete the given volume.
        Parameters:
        volume - The volume to delete.

      • moveVolume

        com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto moveVolume(com.abiquo.server.core.infrastructure.storage.VolumeManagementDto volume,
                                                                           com.abiquo.server.core.cloud.VirtualDatacenterDto newVirtualDatacenter)
        Moves the given volume to a new virtual datacenter.

        The Abiquo API will return a 301 (Moved Permanently), so redirects must be enabled to make this method succeed.

        Parameters:
        volume - The volume to move.
        newVirtualDatacenter - The destination virtual datacenter.
        Returns:
        The reference to the volume in the new virtual datacenter.
